card.name: Abid bin Haji, Scholar of Mirrors (G6)
card.printed_name: Abid bin Haji, Scholar of Mirrors

rulings.ruling: His ability does not let him fulfill card requirements if they are not played normally, like when using {Piper} to recruit an ally. [LSJ 20050119]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NKWhBnp7uP4/6_56LlSV658J

Card with multiple types (eg. Combat/Action Modifier) are considered of the type they are played as, not both. [PIB 20150924-2]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/73293-adana-de-sforza-combo-cards#73307

The damage inflicted by his ability is environmental. [RTR 19970630] [LSJ 20070328]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/3o0R9bLjrQk/9TjsEa_VnhAJ
His ability to get a press can only be used during the press step. [PIB 20150121]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/68745-presses-outside-of-the-press-step?start=0#68757

Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. [RTR 19941109] [TOM 19951216] [PIB 20140324] [ANK 20200422]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/0G-jqB_fcyE/8jUhfCXRtPUJhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/60259-carrion-crows-first-strike-strikes-not-anaesthetic-touch?start=0#60260http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78582-thoughts-betrayed-interaction-with-different-striking-situation#99680

Additional draws are not subject to his ability (eg. {Infernal Pursuit}, {Aura Reading}, {Learjet}). [LSJ 20011202]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/gyzUP4TCq6M/D-u3Uzdy6SMJ

If Agaitas is burned while cards owned by your prey are still face-up in front of you, you can still play and discard them as normal, but you cannot draw in your prey's library until you control Agaitas anew. [LSJ 20100304]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/UAllw82N9fw/Xl1zGn7t-3cJ

Cards from his ability that go into an ash heap, hand, or library always go into their owner's ash heap, hand, or library (eg. using {Heart of Nizchetus}). [RTR 19970425] [LSJ 20060921]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/DhP_l2cX3mQ/9ZZZqL8NFSAJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/Lj1GDLBmOWQ/m/-ZbHv_NcqW4J
A weapon available from his ability can be chosen for a {Concealed Weapon}. [LSJ 20060913]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/GpSAQnN6GnY/m/6EqRGDT3u08J
"Once each turn" means once during each player's turn. [ANK 20180719-4]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76833-once-each-turn#89014
The ability can be used while locked, only once per referendum. [ANK 20220705]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79895-question-regarding-using-a-minion-card-text-ability-when-locked#105630

If his ability is used to start a new combat, effects that end combat and then do something else after combat (include continuing the action as if unblocked) will be lost, except for unlock effects. Her ability triggers after combat if she's still in play, even in torpor. If she is burned during combat, it does not trigger. [ANK 20200420-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78576-amelia-the-blood-red-tears#99641

If multiple combats occur in the same action, the opposing minion burns 1 blood or life each time the combat ends. [ANK 20200420-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78576-amelia-the-blood-red-tears#99641
In the case of {Free Fight}, the last opposing minion burns the blood. [ANK 20200420-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78576-amelia-the-blood-red-tears#99641

His "as he enters play" ability can be used before he enters contest if there is another one in play. This is not self-contesting. Titles: When meeting a title requirement, he is considered a member of the underlying sect. He can meet a given generic title (eg. Prince) only once, but the controller chooses how it is met (any city, even a made-up one). He must choose a title when playing a card required a "titled" vampire (eg. {Rubicon}), but can only choose each title once. He can choose the non-descript "X votes" title, but only once. [LSJ 20050128] [PIB 20150306] [PIB 20150307] [ANK 20211019]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/HVy8iPUxNbI/ZHGTnprQjGUJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/69627-vlad-tepes-regent?start=12#69696http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/69627-vlad-tepes-regent?start=18#69732https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79278-vidal-jarbeaux-cards-requiring-prince#103598

When meeting a title requirement for a political action, he does not get the title's votes for the subsequent referendum. [ANK 20231221]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/81065-faking-title-and-votes#110148

He can meet a title requirement even if the sect does not exist anymore (eg. {Fall of the Camarilla}). Burns if ranged aggravated damage is inflicted on it at close range. [PIB 20110818]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/8475-q-question-about-abbysal-hunter#8477

If moved to the uncontrolled region (eg. by {Banishment}), it continues to be a vampire and can be influenced as a 1 capacity vampire. Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. Each of their turns, the person subjected to Betrayer can name a vampire. If the guess is correct, Betrayer is burned. [RTR 19941109]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJ

Is cumulative: a player can be damaged by multiple Betrayers each turn. A Methuselah targeted by more than one Betrayer would have to pay 1 pool for each Betrayer in order to burn them, even if the same vampire is the betrayer in each case. [RTR 19941109]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJ

If the vampire chosen for Betrayer is burned, so is Betrayer. If the vampire chosen for Betrayer becomes contested, Betrayer is nullified until the contest is resolved, at which time the Betrayer is reactivated. If a player takes control of the vampire that is the target of the betrayer, that player takes the pool loss. [RTR 19941109]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJ

You select an uncontrolled vampire when you play the card. If you have a choice (more than one of your uncontrolled vampires is controlled by the other Methuselah), you still have to choose just one of them to be the Betrayer. [LSJ 19990419]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/VispLaSnxUc/xRn4B3QQQGwJ
"that minion" refers to the target and "this minion" to the acting minion. [ANK 20180518]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76623-big-game#87131
Is not replaced if the action is blocked: it is replaced when the action ends, after all combats. [LSJ 20001120]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Br8FPS5mRn4/2tbPhQquS7gJ
The discipline needs not be announced when Bima is played. The replacement card can be used if it is a discipline. [PIB 20150418]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/70589-bima#70591

"that Discipline" refers to the card on Bima. If the card is no longer there, then the effect cannot be used. [LSJ 20071006]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Ugcdb0ljZrU/RAS1IrL9FM0J

If it uses its last life to pay for an action, the action still resolves fully. If that leads to an oust, the oust is resolved before resolving effects triggered by the fact that the Bima burns. [LSJ 20080512]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/z2DGSFph6sM/IjJB89nbtlsJ

Ghouls are monsters, not mortal. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78415-is-ghoul-mortal#98872https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bzusnKlnYr8/OSMvzE7YjokJ

Must be played before action resolution, ie. before any modifier or reaction played "as the action/bleed would be successful" are played. May be played before, during, or after votes and ballots have been cast. [LSJ 19980130]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/mtjOAd7aaYI/XZq9o1cUd-8J

Cannot be moved to a Malkavian nor to a Malkavian antitribu vampire. [LSJ 19970224]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/80KRDjVFkyg/TBJso9Ra_9QJ

The clan is set when the card is played, it does not depend on the clan of the vampire that has the card on them. [LSJ 20070707]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/ZtRk5z2TcoI/gJWD0dT3kUwJ

Is a temporary effect that overrides the underlying sect. The most recent override takes precedence, but if a more recent would set the sect to Camarilla, it sets it to Independent instead while the Fall is in play. If the Fall leaves play, the vampire retrieves his underlying sect. Is a temporary effect that overrides the underlying sect. The most recent override takes precedence, but if a more recent would set the sect to Sabbat, it sets it to Independent instead while the Fall is in play. If the Fall leaves play, the vampire retrieves his underlying sect. [LSJ 20080510] [LSJ 20100811] [ANK 20190619]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/67g8kq3F_uw/MAAoEV0Jf_kJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/kGKWcs3k6vI/Uwx7TGC8lgYJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77723-writ-of-acceptance-and-anarch-and-hackerspace#95462

Vampires with a Sabbat title lose the benefit from it until they becomre Sabbat again. They immediately yield the title if it is contested or if they receives a new one. [LSJ 20060904]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/L9D4GK0yNv8/H9vnUciv2psJ

An "impersonator" (eg. {Vlad Tepes}) can still play cards requiring Sabbat or a Sabbat title. [CHI] Cannot be used to get stealth then cancel the [aus] card that provided intercept to the blocking minion. [ANK 20180201]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76400-question-about-false-resonance#85191

If the canceled card had a "Do Not Replace Until" clause on it, that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally. [LSJ 20011023]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/2GOLIrXAF8M/P4T3Dj6UNL0J

Paying a pool during the unlock phase can be ordered with other unlock effects by the acting Methuselah, but must be handled before another Methuselah has the opportunity to use an unlock effect. [LSJ 20010121]https://boardgamegeek.com/thread/609699/article/6142361#6142361
Cannot be played if intercept is not required (as per the rules, section 6.2.2). [ANK 20200329]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78546-familial-bond#99451

The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JWiZmyC2Y6s/q6JHYrE1zKYJ

The vampire need not attempt to block nor play further reaction cards: that is merely an option. [TOM 19951129]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/jjBzopH-yrQ/L51mbZ5KGLkJ

If he fails to block, the vampire only burns a blood when the action begins to resolve (successfully or not). He can pay for reactions after declining to block, before burning a blood. [LSJ 19990421]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bYwaXWdJX84/qajsOL_I_LoJ
Can be played after action resolution to use a reaction card (eg. {Fast Reaction} after combat). [LSJ 20091123]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Yt7LsvWFwiM/op6oRS8SLiYJ

The vampire needs not pay a blood if he successfully blocks, even if the action continues as if unblocked after the block (eg. {Form of Mist}). [LSJ 20070417]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/ecDUqbSUsNg/m/3W9aOm0MfYEJ

Does not consider blocks made before the card was played (if the action has been continued with eg. {Form of Mist}). [ANK 20230319]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80393-forced-awakening-and-wmrh-talk-radio-vs-form-of-mist#107674

[cel][for] Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Action modifiers and effects that can be played "after resolution" can be played before or after it. [LSJ 19981028] [ANK 20190425]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JZHY1bTCAa0/XqDVERty0roJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77581-action-modifiers-played-at-beginning-and-end-of-an-action#94652

Can be used to unlock if the action is successful, even if it has no effect due to lack of a suitable target. [LSJ 20070411]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/umdINigMKqs/l6GFRVKdkMsJ
Prevents up to 2 damage, it can be used to prevent less. [RTR 20041202]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/WUWh7AdooDU/vojisZMCSnsJ

If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methuselah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action (eg. {Bum's Rush}). [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

"continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/jzMOxZ9oxOs/o0X7GUFmii0J

[DOM] Can be played against a target with 10 or more pool and does not count against the limit in this case: it will only have a lingering effect (+3 bleed if the target happens to have 9 or less). [PIB 20110817] [ANK 20191031]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/8405-foreshadowing-destruction-is-usable-at-dom-vs-10-pool#8414https://www.vekn.net/2-uncategorised/465-vampire-elder-kindred-network-newsletter-october-2019

[DOM] If the bleed bonus is lost during the action (eg. {Deflection} to another target), it does not count against the limit anymore and an additional bleed modifier can be used. [ANK 20191031] [ANK 20211019-2]https://www.vekn.net/2-uncategorised/465-vampire-elder-kindred-network-newsletter-october-2019https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79390-sup-foreshadoing-destruction-when-the-target-has-10-or-more-pool?start=6#103593

May be used anytime it is unlocked, even if it has been used previously during the same action (it must be unlocked by some method, of course). [TOM 19960109]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/gB3xexVAV0s/zGnkjIMjyJsJ
Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/0LLTOfvyVbM/ih72_C-LriwJ

[PRO] If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

[PRO] If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methuselah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

[PRO] An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action (eg. {Bum's Rush}). [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

[PRO] "continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/jzMOxZ9oxOs/o0X7GUFmii0J

[PRO] If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the "After combat ends" effect cannot be used. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501] [LSJ 20031123]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/d2U51Uw0Hfg/uIPoVvPFePgJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/HvM2cHJ6yIo/jsb4iRoNdWkJ

The maneuver, and equipment restriction, apply only in the combat resulting from a successful block. They do not carry over to follow-up combats (eg. [CEL] {Psyche!}). [LSJ 20010813] [LSJ 20010819-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/8MR4bq0Cxj4/f_rAOuj3CboJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/8MR4bq0Cxj4/m/YgNsk8nGcREJ

The maneuver, and equipment restriction, apply again if a second block happens on the same action (eg. after [PRO] {Form of Mist}). [LSJ 20010814-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/8MR4bq0Cxj4/m/SH4dKuz8qO0J
A hunt is not successful if no blood is gained, even if the hunt action is still successful. [LSJ 20050720-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/1vbIkgvKDJ0/3ErIIMXFgPIJ
Cannot be used if there is no equipment to destroy. [RTR 19980928]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Xva4_IRavxM/F-_fjzTmo88J
[pot] Is not a damaging strike. [LSJ 19970225]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/xcp3faFaHZ8/_3NVdFJ3Tv4J
[POT] Is a damaging strike. [LSJ 19970225]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/xcp3faFaHZ8/_3NVdFJ3Tv4J

card.name: Fragment of the Book of Nod
card.printed_name: Fragment of the Book of Nod

rulings.ruling: Cannot be used when a card is played to draw a card that would cancel it "as it is played". [RTR 20040501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7-mp3Ada86I/yenQ7FZ-VMIJ

Can be used during an action, when the controller has the opportunity to play an effect. [ANK 20200616]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78687-the-erciyes-fragments-fragment-of-the-book-of-nod-barrens-impulse#100110

[FOR] Is played after all combats are handled. Can be played from torpor. [RTR 19980623] [LSJ 20030103] [ANK 20180906]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/tSpd9dtTElc/-CuHJF54_n0Jhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/TUDO_4FwdyY/DWOwgQL850gJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76981-freak-drive-while-going-to-torpor#90451

[for] Can be played if the action is unblocked even if it has no effect due to lack of a suitable target. [LSJ 20070411]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/umdINigMKqs/l6GFRVKdkMsJ
[for] Is played after the action resolves. (eg. if played after equipping {Learjet}, you draw an additional card). [PIB 20150915]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/73134-learjet#73139

Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Action modifiers and effects that can be played "after resolution" can be played before or after it. [LSJ 19981028] [ANK 20190425]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JZHY1bTCAa0/XqDVERty0roJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77581-action-modifiers-played-at-beginning-and-end-of-an-action#94652

A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Q_Lk0DPHqC8/nAfGfCvsISgJ

If there are insuffient targets to which to allocate all of the points allowed, then the card cannot be played. [LSJ 20010810]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/FUXkrq3B_O8/pimj1Vvw7WIJ
The votes provided by the Priscii sub-referendum are not affected. [ANK 20180307-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76452-ballot-vs-fee-stake#85610

Only prevents the use of equipment after it is played - it will not cancel the effects of equipment used before it is played. [TOM 19960326]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/8DA9p_p5v8s/lJlHFYXPTBYJ
Requirements do not apply when taking control of a card already in play. [TOM 19960226-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/16y-ZD7Xats/oMeZDnSFdYAJ
If you play more than one, you gain and loose pool for all of them (they stack). [LSJ 20061018]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/Prc45fTQd9Y/m/uvFhSQKCBakJ
Is not replaced until the condition is met, even if it is burned. [LSJ 20080805]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/SIbzFAwWDKs/BDkEg19txtoJ

Is a change of the actual sect. A temporary effect overriding the sect has precedence and if it does, this card burns (eg. {Writ of Acceptance}). [LSJ 20100811]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/kGKWcs3k6vI/Uwx7TGC8lgYJ

If the target changes sect to a sect inappropriate for his title, he loses its benefit until his sect is appropriate. He immediately yields the title if it is contested or he receives a new one. [LSJ 20060904]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/L9D4GK0yNv8/H9vnUciv2psJ

If the controller of a Gambit in play withdraws, his or her predator gets a VP from the Gambit (the Methuselah who withdraws still gets a VP for withdrawing, of course). [RTR 20040501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7-mp3Ada86I/yenQ7FZ-VMIJ

The gain blood effect is applied after combats ends, no combat card can be played afterwards. The acting player chooses the order of after-combat effects. [LSJ 20100324]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/PWhoejXDuuA/4E1wohx0oHwJ

If blocked, no other effect can be used to reset the range, but other pre-range effects can be played. [RTR 19970630] [ANK 20180720]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76840-setting-range-and-pre-range#89125

If another effect also sets the range, the first to resolve has priority (eg. {Asanbonsam Ghoul} and {Neutral Guard} resolve after). [PIB 20120214]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/22906-re-set-the-range?start=12#22999

Must be played (as well as other "as the action is announced" action modifiers) before action modifiers that are not explicitly played "as the action is announced" (e.g., {Conditioning}). [ANK 20190425]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77581-action-modifiers-played-at-beginning-and-end-of-an-action#94652

Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77210-touch-of-clarity-and-fast-reaction-is-posible-to-play-with-locked-minion?start=6#92308
Can only be played if a Blood Hunt referendum succeeds, after votes and ballots have been cast. [LSJ 20081203-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/hlK89M1M9rk/m/qNtOFQfDK-oJ
Does not count as a "slave" nor as a "Gargoyle" for game purposes. He is just an ally. [LSJ 20011210-4]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/WT1LwCFnU9A/T4bZS_BQXGUJ

When ending combat, cards that are played at the end of round/combat can still be played (eg. {Taste of Vitae}, {Disarm}). [RTR 20001020] [LSJ 20001024]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/GvxNYsYsWJ4/EY7NOjdsGCsJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/GvxNYsYsWJ4/m/8PDeV_mQ8XEJ

A card requiring a Baron (eg. {Open War}) is a card requiring an Anarch. [LSJ 20050128] [LSJ 20080603]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/HVy8iPUxNbI/ZHGTnprQjGUJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/9usl4idp-pY/m/LuT1iK1b4QIJ

The ability to burn an opponent going to torpor is not part of the strike. It can be used if the opponent dodges the strike but is still going to torpor. A second copy allows a second use in the same combat. [ANK 20230316]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80385-amulet-of-temporal-perception-burning-and-reuse#107638

Only usable to move the target vampire from your uncontrolled region to your ready region. It cannot rescue a vampire from torpor. [LSJ 20030520-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Z2fW6tgT5u0/QVtombu2I6QJ
Can be used (if unlocked) during any Methuselah's influence phase. [ANK 20240118]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/81155-gather#110398
[nec] The card to retrieve must be announced when declaring the action. [LSJ 20010627]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NhNCVCCDyU0/I5Yph3-UUPsJ

Does not protect the minion's equipment, retainers, or any other cards on him. Just him and his blood. [LSJ 20031118]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/9IzmBh8PWe0/J1F_TzPbITsJ

A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. This is not a directed action, even when targeting another Methuselah's ash heap. [LSJ 20010627] [ANK 20181129]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NhNCVCCDyU0/I5Yph3-UUPsJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77198-pressing-flesh-from-other-player-s-ash-heap#92145

"Since your last turn" means between the end of your last turn and now. Your last turn does not qualify, your current turn does. [LSJ 20020429]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7ZfedGTVt9g/kQnfy7J_UYkJ
Cannot be used if blocked when leaving torpor, as no combat would happen. [ANK 20181122-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77171-acting-in-torpor-with-ghoul-escort?start=12#91966

Ghouls are monsters, not mortal. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78415-is-ghoul-mortal#98872https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bzusnKlnYr8/OSMvzE7YjokJ

Ghouls are monsters, not mortal. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78415-is-ghoul-mortal#98872https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bzusnKlnYr8/OSMvzE7YjokJ
The 1 Damage is not inflicted at long range. [ANK 20210929]https://www.vekn.net/forum/generic-v-tes-discussion/75623-ghoul-retainer?start=12#103386

The Ghoul is not the bearer of the weapon, the employer is (eg. using {Garrote} does not allow the bearer to burn the opponent, {Zip Gun}'s damage go to the employer). [TOM 19951114] [LSJ 20080210]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/LOEFFpprXKs/3iG4c1loOqgJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/nL-xqiydvYg/m/hWQZF3aBdwsJ

The Ghoul uses weapon as if making the strike, including all side-effects (eg. {Zip Gun}'s damage, {Weighted Walking Stick} tokens), and is not limited to damage dealing strikes (eg. {Rowan Ring} sends to torpor, {Flash Grenade} ends combat). It is not a strike and cannot provide a maneuver, press or additional strike to the employer (eg. {Meat Hook}). [LSJ 20080210]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/nL-xqiydvYg/m/hWQZF3aBdwsJ

The Ghoul cannot play ammo cards (not even with a {Magazine}), although it can benefit from ammo cards played by the employer in an earlier round (eg. {Scattershot}). [LSJ 20080210]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/nL-xqiydvYg/m/hWQZF3aBdwsJ

The damage is environmental, the retainer is the damage source. Immunity to retainer or retainer type works against it. Damage is inflicted even against a dodge. A "strike: combat ends" ends combat before damage is applied, as will a combattant going to torpor during first strike. She can use her ability to burn an equipment an opponent has commited to use as a strike (eg. by using the maneuver of a {.44 Magnum}). In this case the opponent strike has no effect. [PIB 20141026]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/66960-gianna-di-canneto#66971

She cannot use her ability to inflict damage if a "Strike: combat ends" was used, or if combat ends due to first strike aggravated damage. [ANK 20211130]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/66960-re-gianna-di-canneto?start=6#104061

Cannot target an uncontrolled vampire. [LSJ 20061109]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/b3K7k1mRyno/8pWeDHZpbw8J

The number of cards to put on it is announced when the action is declared, they must be in hand before drawing the replacement for this card. [PIB 20150428]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/70714-card-replacement?start=6#70747

At action resolution, the number of cards declared must be put on the card. If there are less cards available (eg. {Form of Mist} was played to continue the action), then all of them are put on the Gift. [PIB 20150428]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/70714-card-replacement?start=6#70747

[obe], [OBE] Forbids any combat with the ally afterwards. Cards that would start a new combat cannot be played (eg. {Psyche!}, {Bum's Rush}). [ANK 20220429]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79754-heavens-gate-new-wording#105112

[obe], [OBE] Can be played before another replacement effect triggers (eg. {Charigger, The Axe}), depending on sequencing. [ANK 20230816]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80772-heaven-s-gate-vs-charigger-the-axe#109057

May not be locked "in response" to an effect: all effects are instantaneous except for actions and certain combat effects. Cannot be used to put a card on a vampire who is prohibited to have it (eg. an equipment on {Enkidu, The Noah}). [LSJ 19980831]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Za8AS17xXPM/Ttki0DplaeYJ

Cannot be used before damage is inflicted after action resolution (eg. {Force of Will}, {Daring the Dawn}): this is still during the action. [ANK 20171124]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76304-question-about-timing-of-force-of-will-damage-and-heidelberg?start=0#84354

Cannot be used after a diablerie or an {Abactor} resolution and before the Blood Hunt: the Blood Hunt is part of the action although it is independent from it. Can be used to move more blood than the target can hold: the excess goes to the blood bank. [ANK 20170804]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76053-heidelberg-castle-and-moving-blood#82874

Can be used between two actions during another Methuselah's turn. [ANK 20210608]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79166-correct-time-to-use-heidelberg-castle-germany-for-non-acting-player?start=12#102425

If directly put (and not equipped) on the vampire, it is not locked (eg. using {Alastor}). [LSJ 20090415] [LSJ 20100119]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/oDvJWs7majs/m/fAtt19fFsTcJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/1eULCGaVcO0/m/eefMWzjoK0IJ
It comes locked if it is equipped, even in an non-standard fashion (eg. {Magic of the Smith}). [LSJ 20100119]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/1eULCGaVcO0/m/eefMWzjoK0IJ

[cel] A limited additional strike can be played before or after. [LSJ 20001206] [ANK 20211124]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/kFIO74LxqFQ/m/U1Dtf3f4CPgJhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79501-addition-strikes#103982

Ghouls are monsters, not mortal. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78415-is-ghoul-mortal#98872https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bzusnKlnYr8/OSMvzE7YjokJ
Can use {Charming Lobby} to call a referendum "as a vampire". [RTR 20020501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJ

If it uses its last life to pay for an action, the action still resolves fully. If that leads to an oust, the oust is resolved before resolving effects triggered by the fact that the Herald burns. [LSJ 20080512]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/z2DGSFph6sM/IjJB89nbtlsJ
Cannot play Anarch cards. [ANK 20230810]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80760-herald-of-tophet-cards-with-anarch-requirement#109002

If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77034-allies-and-vampire-disciplines-specifically-the-nocturn#90809
The strikes it provides are Potence [pot] strikes (eg. they benefit from {Increased Strength}). [LSJ 20081120-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/e2PNDpg-l_c/wqEDxGHKJQgJ

Effects that end combat and then do something else after combat (include continuing the action as if unblocked) will be lost, except for unlock effects. Cannot be used to start a new combat if there is already a pending combat queued. [RTR 20020501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJ
Can only be played by the controller of the acting minion. [LSJ 19990425]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Mmfn07ib6Yw/YfwpUlqEdrEJ
Cannot be used to enter combat with a vampire on his way to torpor. [LSJ 20100604-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Tr3X4DsZr-8/DMXtyDoNqLIJ

The opponent cannot play or use the maneuver from a strike (eg. {.44 Magnum}, {Thrown Gate}), since they cannot strike. [LSJ 20001126]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/ZK97Kk4WQ00/m/SJPz6uc5Xw8J
The 'X' in card text refers to the cost of the card. [LSJ 19970224]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/80KRDjVFkyg/TBJso9Ra_9QJ

Prevents up to X+1 damage, it can prevent less (X can be higher than strictly needed). Cannot be used if there is no damage to prevent (X cannot be negative). [LSJ 20001114] [LSJ 20030121]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/qXSlM7Grq1c/cSDoQ9mw0z4Jhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/lED3kZ2UUUo/m/8TgrW3RxQ9QJ

X can be zero. [LSJ 20030502]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/qBa9CvBwqNA/m/ZuBgMjNgb6EJ

[REACTION] Can be used only when reactions can be used (unlocked or with a wake effect). It does not count as playing a reaction card. [ACTION MODIFIER] [1 CONVICTION] Effects that are used "as the action is announced" must be used before playing "regular" action modifier or reaction cards. [ANK 20190425]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77581-action-modifiers-played-at-beginning-and-end-of-an-action#94652

[val] If the action fails, modifiers and reactions that can be used at the end/after an action can still be used afterwards. [val] An ally has life, not blood, he cannot pay. [LSJ 20050216] [ANK 20190701]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/5_rUFgufFc4/7OVVD0KpnS4Jhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77763-multiple-questions#95690

When setting the range for the round, no other effect can be used to reset the range. Skip the determine range step this round, but other pre-range effects can be played afterwards. Applies to the current action card, if any. [LSJ 20091002]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/hINpwz-JjjY/m/c97m8NLQNckJ

If it uses its last life to play an action modifier, the action fails. If it uses its last life to play a strike, combat ends before strike resolution. [ANK 20180928-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77034-allies-and-vampire-disciplines-specifically-the-nocturn#90809

A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. The weapon is burned or returned to the library if it is still in play, even if it is not on the minion anymore (eg. {Rowan Ring}, {Wooden Stake}). [LSJ 20001019]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bSH8Q_kDhNQ/eHEX6PmfaB0J

The hunt bonus applies to non-standard hunt actions, blood comes from the target of the hunt. [RTR 20030519] [RTR 20180511]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76595-rules-team-rulings-rtr-11-05-2018#86780

The vampire receiving the card must meet all of the requirements of the card other than the Thaumaturgy requirement. When an oust occurs, there is no discard phase: the new turns begins immediately (eg. {The Unmasking} is not replaced). [LSJ 20090731]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/y6f0s6tUtqs/H3dk4qr4nfkJ

The anarch can return to play when it again has blood >= capacity on it at the end of its Methuselah's influence phase. [AUS][FOR] Unused prevention does not carry over. [LSJ 20001114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/qXSlM7Grq1c/cSDoQ9mw0z4J

[AUS][FOR] The burn blood effect is not reduced by effects that reduce the cost of the card (eg. {Una}). The card cannot be played if the minion cannot afford to burn the blood. [ANK 20210226]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79045-paths-and-burn-blood-requrement?start=18#101726

Can only be played by the controller of the acting minion. [LSJ 19990425]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Mmfn07ib6Yw/YfwpUlqEdrEJ

Cannot be used to take over an action granted by an equipment the masked minion has, even if the masking vampire also has the same equipment. [LSJ 20020926]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/C7vgb-0Mcbo/6UHJsQjBs9wJ

The action remains the same. All action modifiers remain in effect, but inherent modifiers (a minion's inherent +1 bleed for example) do not. All other effects carry over to the new masking vampire. [RTR 19951110] [LSJ 19971201] [RTR 20030519] [LSJ 20030521] [ANK 20210309]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/TXfganI5B2o/QYh3AdPNbUwJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/0I7KUhvhAig/kLiqzfugXTwJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Ude2or4n9nI/6u41LfeOpQQJhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79063-daring-the-dawn-and-then-mask-of-a-thousand-faces#101805

Cannot be used to mask an action if the masking vampire is not capable of taking that action, nor if any effect (modifier, reaction, {Aching Beauty}, inherent stealth), has been played on this action that could not have been played if the masking minion were the acting minion (not counting blood spent). [RTR 19980623] [RTR 20030519] [LSJ 20030520] [RTR 20041202]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/tSpd9dtTElc/-CuHJF54_n0Jhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/wltIoG3qv_I/m/8-SFgJp_hmUJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/WUWh7AdooDU/vojisZMCSnsJ

Can be used after blocks are declined if the masked minion was benefiting from an effect that made him unblockable, even if the masking minion does not benefit from the same effect (eg. {Toreador Grand Ball}, {Nakhthorheb}). Can be used to take over a mandatory action that was not mandatory for the masker, but that he could perform (eg. a hunt). [LSJ 20001113]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/m2grSgEaYMw/m/UYODWWyf_BEJ

The masking vampire can play a modifier already played by the masked minion. He cannot use a limited effect (ie. bleed enhancer) if a limited effect has already been used on the action. [ANK 20190117-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77308-mask-of-a-1000-faces-and-bleed-modifiers#92987
Multiple copies can be played by different vampires on the same action. [ANK 20200515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78634-blanket-of-night#99838

If used to set the range, no other effect can be used to reset the range. Skip the determine range step on that round, but other pre-range effects can be played afterwards. If an action is blocked, no other effect can be used (eg. {Crypt's Sons}) before resolving Millicent's delayed effect. The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JWiZmyC2Y6s/q6JHYrE1zKYJ

[DOM] The stolen minion returns to his previous controller even if he is in torpor (but stays in torpor). [LSJ 20010119]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/XB0IvK7I6PQ/foA7igsB8EEJ

The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JWiZmyC2Y6s/q6JHYrE1zKYJ

Pay the cost (if any, eg. {Secure Haven} or {Villein} on the target) at the same time you gain pool from it, you do not get ousted in between. [LSJ 20020620]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/WoXWzLYaFSY/ug3CHnpMCUQJ

[CHI] An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action (eg. {Bum's Rush}). [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

[CHI] "continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the opponent strikes: combat ends, this strike is not resolved and the Cocktail is not put on this minion, even if combat continues thanks to another effect like {Relentless Reaper}. [ANK 20200203-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78416-molotov-vs-combat-ends#98878

If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. [RTR 19941109] [ANK 20190116]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.deckmaster/_6CXoKTSLnw/FdG67-3HEAQJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methuselah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action (eg. {Bum's Rush}). [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

"continue as if unblocked" moves the action card from the ash heap (where it went when the action was blocked) to limbo (where it should be if the action is not blocked). If the action card is not in the ash heap, then the action cannot be continued. [LSJ 20070808-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/jzMOxZ9oxOs/o0X7GUFmii0J

Can be used if a Slave locked to enter combat instead of the blocking minion, if the other conditions are met. [ANK 20200114]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78321-slave-rule-and-acting-minion#98584

Is played after resolution, but still during the action. Cards and effects that played "after resolution" (eg. {Freak Drive}) can be played before it, but not after. [LSJ 19981028] [LSJ 20100206-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JZHY1bTCAa0/XqDVERty0roJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/reXyybyIYX8/m/jeCyjdiZ5T4J

Is played after all combats are handled. Can be played from torpor. [LSJ 20030103] [ANK 20181219] [ANK 20180906]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/TUDO_4FwdyY/DWOwgQL850gJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77232-zephyr-timing#92505http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76981-freak-drive-while-going-to-torpor#90451
The answer must be "yes" or "no", to the best of the player's knowledge. [LSJ 20021122-4]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/UMRxkpa8gTI/m/qUuLt5iOn1MJ

The owner and target Methuselah have to agree on the meanings of the terms of the question (eg. "bounce" card). In case of doubt, they should discuss to agree on a shared meaning for those terms before answering the question. [LSJ 20030908]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/Cr6-oQgH9ic/m/hDbsOahcqVkJ

The answer may be inexact when pertaining to an unverifiable element, such as the deck's content. A judge cannot be called to check the deck content. [LSJ 20021121-3] [PIB 20111213]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/UMRxkpa8gTI/m/dnpMCjdEKx0Jhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/18214-monocle-of-clarity-questions-about-the-deck-contents#18220

The owner must indicate that they are using the Monocle to ask the question, by whatever method passes for such an indication. [LSJ 20021121-4]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/UMRxkpa8gTI/m/6Zm8x2UpzxEJ

You can ask a question about multiple things using conjunctions, as long as the question as a whole can be answered by "yes" or "no". [LSJ 20021212]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/xOWqBanXkgQ/m/ZwReZxcWAk0J

The card is not put on the target vampire if he or she uses another effect than Monomancy to end combat. [RTR 20020501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJ

Is used after combat effectively ends and can be order against other cards and effects played after combat (eg. {Provision of the Silsila}). [ANK 20230314]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80378-monster-vs-provision-of-silsila#107622
"Once each turn" means once during each player's turn. [ANK 20180719-4]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76833-once-each-turn#89014

[val] If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the card is not put on the opposing minion, he can act and block. [RTR 20020501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJ

[VAL] If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methuselah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

[VAL] An action cannot continue "as if unblocked" after a combat resulting from a successful action (eg. {Bum's Rush}). [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

[DOM] Can be played by a locked vampire. [LSJ 19980210]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/v7PxbzgVG0c/Fr0CsYqf9QMJ

[DOM] Cannot be used to let the target play a [dom] action card. [LSJ 20100527]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Tr3X4DsZr-8/O06iXN6LtzsJ

The unlock effect takes place before the end of combat. The rest of the effect takes place after the end of combat. [RTR 19970630]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KireUeOYY3c/t6ifm9lur1kJ

If combat continues or a new combat begins, the vampire unlocks but does not go to torpor. [RTR 20020501] [LSJ 20020505]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/ka9MajuWTAo/M4oCzY97K_kJ

Once in play, can be equipped from the minion it's on (rulebook action) by another minion that does not meet the requirements. [ANK 20180719-3]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76834-moving-equipment-with-requirements#89044
Cards are not replaced during the "as played" window. [LSJ 20061013]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/6w8K3yDtBH0/m/M_SZH9Id8n8J

If the canceled card had a "Do Not Replace Until" clause on it, that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally. [LSJ 20011023]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/2GOLIrXAF8M/P4T3Dj6UNL0J

Are neither mortal nor monster. [ANK 20200203-2] [LSJ 20060515]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78415-is-ghoul-mortal#98872https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bzusnKlnYr8/OSMvzE7YjokJ

[AUS] Must be played before action resolution, ie. before any modifier or reaction played "as the action/bleed would be successful" are played. Supersedes previous effects that changed the acting minion for the combat (eg. {Deep Song}). [ANK 20211022]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79422-nar-sheptha#103636

If combat ends and a new combat start (eg. [CEL] {Psyche!}), the opponent redraws and discard again. [LSJ 20030530]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/SZehI8SwAc4/shpyPIdsHxUJ

If multiple ousts happen, players whose prey gets ousted get a victory point, even if they are being ousted themselves. His life total can exceed his starting life capacity (it is the case for all allies). [ANK 20171109]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76282-ossian-and-nephandus#84174

Damage reduction applies to damage done outside of or after combat if it comes from a strike (eg. {Catatonic Fear}). If multiple ousts happen, players whose prey gets ousted get a victory point, even if they are being ousted themselves. [ANK 20190425]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77581-action-modifiers-played-at-beginning-and-end-of-an-action#94652

Methuselahs do not gain the pool granted by a bleed action (eg. {Kindred Spirits}) if they do not have the edge or a VP beforehand. [LSJ 20100206-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/reXyybyIYX8/m/jeCyjdiZ5T4J

Methuselahs gain the pool granted by an effect after a successful bleed action (eg. {The unnamed}), since they get the edge before the effect kicks in. [LSJ 20100210-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/wt2kuUJXoRI/m/XbHSJHMfk08J
When ousting their prey, Methuselahs decide if they gain the VP before or after gaining the pool. [LSJ 20100208]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/wt2kuUJXoRI/m/CyHXMb-Cn_0J

{Off Kilter}'s additional pool cannot be gained if you do not have a VP (edge is burned before pool is gained). [LSJ 20100207]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/wt2kuUJXoRI/m/LVO2J4dRxoIJ
Is not replaced until the condition is met, even if it is burned. [LSJ 20080805]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/SIbzFAwWDKs/BDkEg19txtoJ
Can be played after a diablerie, before the blood hunt. [ANK 20201228]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78956-timing-of-blood-hunt-following-amaranth#101316

The hunt bonus applies to non-standard hunt actions, blood comes from the target of the hunt. [RTR 20030519] [RTR 20180511]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76595-rules-team-rulings-rtr-11-05-2018#86780

Once in play, can be equipped from the minion it's on (rulebook action) by another minion that does not meet the requirements. [ANK 20180719-3]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76834-moving-equipment-with-requirements#89044
[VIS] Superior still prevents only half of the current strike. [PIB 20120116]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/20929-superior-rockheart-how-much-does-it-prevent#20934

"Since your last turn" means between the end of your last turn and now. Your last turn does not qualify, your current turn does. [LSJ 20020429]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7ZfedGTVt9g/kQnfy7J_UYkJ
[for] Cannot be used if there is no damage to prevent. [LSJ 20001114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/qXSlM7Grq1c/cSDoQ9mw0z4J

[FOR] The burn blood effect is not reduced by effects that reduce the cost of the card (eg. {Una}). The card cannot be played if the minion cannot afford to burn the blood. [ANK 20210226]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79045-paths-and-burn-blood-requrement?start=18#101726
He can lock to use his ability the turn he is recruited. [ANK 20180517]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76447-rules-team-rulings-rtr-03-03-2018?start=30#87041
[vic] Is not the default action, no blood is paid for the rescue. [ANK 20181017]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77086-question-recure-of-the-homeland-cost#91228
Is played on the vampire that would receive the aggravated damage. [RTR 19980623]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/tSpd9dtTElc/-CuHJF54_n0J

Can only be played after declaration of a strike, before resolution. It can be played before or after the opponent's strike is announced. [LSJ 19990217] [RTR 20041202] [LSJ 20100119]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/9Bsf2LC1274/pHWAxcO_7pgJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/WUWh7AdooDU/vojisZMCSnsJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/1eULCGaVcO0/m/eefMWzjoK0IJ

Cannot be played if a non-strike effect would inflict aggravated damage (eg. {Outside the Hourglass} with {Domain of Evernight}). REVERSAL of a 2011 ruling. [ANK 20220114]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79432-rotschreck-and-non-strike-agravated-damage?start=12#104475

Cannot be played if the damage is not effective at the current range [RTR 19980928] [ANK 20211102]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Xva4_IRavxM/F-_fjzTmo88Jhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79447-rotschreck-and-dodge#103743

Can be played and is effective even if the opponent treats aggravated damage as normal. [ANK 20200130-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78400-rotshreck#98821

Combat ends immediately, strikes are not resolved (including strike: combat ends), damage prevention cannot be played, and a second Rötschreck cannot be played. [LSJ 19990217] [LSJ 20020715] [LSJ 20060803]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/9Bsf2LC1274/pHWAxcO_7pgJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/-FBxPz-oms0/OV6b9Cc6nl4Jhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/z8Nd8EFQsKc/sP8_LxnEpEIJ

If the combat continues or a new combat begins, the card is put on the vampire, he is not locked and does not go to torpor. He still does not unlock as normal. The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JWiZmyC2Y6s/q6JHYrE1zKYJ
Adding damage to the Ring strike will not deal damage. [RTR 19960221]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/UdU535eVm0Y/AQGxbaznHL0J
Only usable at close range. Damage prevention cannot be used against it. [LSJ 19980219]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/FoVObdCLJPM/Wb6cYwW6-jMJ

If the opponent dodges or ends combat, they avoid the effect and the ring stays. [LSJ 19980219] [ANK 20220923]'https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/FoVObdCLJPM/Wb6cYwW6-jMJhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/80044-enhanced-coagulant-vs-dodge#106405

If the strike is inflicted, the opponent is wounded (if they play {Undying Tenacity}, they go to torpor after combat). [LSJ 20090622-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/1zt1SZb2TIk/m/CYNhVovmlk8J

If placed on a minion that cannot have equipment, the Ring is burned. The "does not unlock as normal" effect still applies. [LSJ 19980831]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Za8AS17xXPM/Ttki0DplaeYJ
The "does not unlock as normal" effect continues to apply if the Ring is burned or moved. [LSJ 19980831]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Za8AS17xXPM/Ttki0DplaeYJ

The "does not unlock as normal" effect is redundant with being infernal. If the minion is infernal, his controller can still pay a pool to unlock him. [LSJ 20050114]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/JWiZmyC2Y6s/q6JHYrE1zKYJ

"Since your last turn" means between the end of your last turn and now. Your last turn does not qualify, your current turn does. [LSJ 20020429]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7ZfedGTVt9g/kQnfy7J_UYkJ

May be put on any minion if the controller changes. If the new controller has no minions, it is burned. [RTR 19960112]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/d3n3StNS7no/k2NmZFUl9fAJ

If the vampire is stolen before "your next turn", the Hand will not allow the vampire an extra unlock until a Methuselah begins a turn with the vampire with the Hand under her control. [LSJ 20031106]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/bFZCLXzzOeM/n1C6p6xw1O0J

If burned and shuffled into the library, other effects that apply when it is burned still apply (eg. {Set's Curse} puts an ally into play). [ANK 20200813]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78798-mummies-and-burning-effects#100529

If it is declared with first strike and if the opposing minion declared a strike based on strength, that minion’s strength is decreased by Scorpion’s Touch when it resolves. [PIB 20110830]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/9340-first-strike--strength-reduction#9345
You cannot play another strike card to serve as the hand strike for Scorpion's Touch. [LSJ 20010627]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NhNCVCCDyU0/I5Yph3-UUPsJ

If the option to burn a vampire is used, the card goes to the predator immediately, even if there is still a mandatory effect to resolve. If not, the predator must take the card when he has the opportunity to play an effect, after the acting Methuselah applied other mandatory effects (eg. losing blood to {Dragonbound}). [ANK 20200508-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78622-scourge-of-the-enochians-timing?start=12#99786

[vis] The maneuver can only be used if the block is successful, and only in the resulting (block-induced) combat. It does not carry over to a follow-up combat (eg. [CEL] {Psyche!}). [LSJ 20010813] [LSJ 20010819-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/8MR4bq0Cxj4/f_rAOuj3CboJhttps://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/8MR4bq0Cxj4/m/YgNsk8nGcREJ

[VIS] If the canceled card had a "Do Not Replace Until" clause on it, that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally. [LSJ 20011023]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/2GOLIrXAF8M/P4T3Dj6UNL0J

The damage the strike does is determined when the strike resolution begins, before the Hordes loses life from any opposing "burn life" or "steal life" effect. Damage done before strike resolution, e.g. with First Strike, will reduce the damage done by the Hordes. Must be played before the bleed can be considered successful (eg. before [OBF] {Spying Mission}), but can be played before or after block attempts. [TOM 19960303] [LSJ 20061212]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/SEU6ztVpR94/F8NmjGw8ml8Jhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/h3onVZ1NqpQ/JYIxdaT9wMEJ

[AUS] Must be played before action resolution, ie. before any modifier or reaction played "as the action/bleed would be successful" are played. It cannot be played after a {Spying Mission} on the vampire triggers. [LSJ 19980105]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/PzVC-AeFuUQ/ncbtQyYNpFQJ

[AUS] Can be played when failing to block because of stealth: it is still declining to block. [ANK 20211003]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/79372-fail-to-block-and-telepathic-misdirection#103416

[AUS] Effects that end combat and then do something else after combat (include continuing the action as if unblocked) will be lost, except for unlock effects. [LSJ 19980109] [RTR 20020501]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/d2U51Uw0Hfg/uIPoVvPFePgJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/M1snoR2msbQ/RFwCmX3anDkJ

[AUS] Cannot be played after [CEL] {Psyche!}. When played before, combat continues and {Psyche!} can only be played at the end of it. [ANK 20191219]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78241-relentless-reaper-vs-blissful-agony-and-scheduled-combat-rulings-ambiguity#98308

[AUS] Must be played after presses, can be played if the round ends prematurely and can be played before or after effects that are played "at then of the round" (eg. {Taste of Vitae}). [LSJ 20021113] [RTR 20030519] [ANK 20180910-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/df2P8YHZex8/mGCmsxDjI_YJhttps://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76990-correct-order-impulse-for-combat-cards-after-combat#90517

[AUS] Can be played before of after effects that are played "at the end of combat". [LSJ 20021113] [ANK 20191219] [ANK 20180910-1]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78241-relentless-reaper-vs-blissful-agony-and-scheduled-combat-rulings-ambiguity#98308https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/df2P8YHZex8/mGCmsxDjI_YJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76990-correct-order-impulse-for-combat-cards-after-combat#90517
May be played before, during, or after votes and ballots have been cast. [LSJ 19980130]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/mtjOAd7aaYI/XZq9o1cUd-8J
[aus] The results are not tallied (eg. {Scorn of Adonis} or {Bribes} have no effect). [LSJ 20010209]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/wYp61ffInqs/m/fG4QzQs9p9IJ

Cannot be used during a referendum that is automatically passing. [PIB 20150105] [LSJ 19980107]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/68465-voting-is-complicated#68493https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/aUUs4VCR_Ec/PLecvfrEqbgJ

Each copy of this card provides its own action: if the vampire manage to unlock during the minion phase, he can perform the action more than once (once per copy). [RTR 20030519]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NOBWXWrd-vA/iEOpQp1uhvAJ

The two actions provided are not cross-restrictive. Each can be performed once during the same turn by the same minion. [LSJ 20100909]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/9Mn1QueD1I4/m/5hwidUeZH6EJ

If used to steal a vampire in combat, combat ends. Any damage yet to resolve still resolves before the change of control. [LSJ 20020618]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/DVGe6EsiMZ4/2-t1mFMkAX0J
The stolen minion is removed from the game when he should return to a Methuselah who has been ousted. [ANK 20181110]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76844-some-questions?start=6#91778

The stolen minion returns to his previous controller even if he is in torpor (but stays in torpor). [LSJ 20010119]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/XB0IvK7I6PQ/foA7igsB8EEJ

If played on one of your own vampires, the action is undirected. Its effect can be used to unlock the vampire. [LSJ 20010828] [ANK 20180917]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KoP_nqv-feM/faZPeRBTL_QJhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77011-condemn-the-sins-of-the-father#90639

Multiple Temptations on the same minion are handled separately: effects do not stack, stealing the minion only burns the counters on one of them. [LSJ 20010227]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/rdkVAtZFC2I/rW1nXhSsyVcJ

No effect can be used between the decision to burn the counters and the moment the vampire changes control: the effect is resolved at once. (eg. {Shalmath} cannot untap). [PIB 20121028]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/39816-ec-2012-can-you-answer-these?start=6#39843
If used to steal a minion attempting to block, the block attempt fails. [LSJ 20080326]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/KUQEznVQlOU/e_6GMg__zdMJ

If used to steal a minion targeted by an action, the action continues with the same target. Methuselahs who declined to block do not get another opportunity. If the target is not legal anymore (eg. [DOM] {Slaughtering the Herd}), the action ends with no effect. [LSJ 20020725]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/wCPFIH_g5ZE/inchZQXKRrsJ

If used to steal a minion during an action, Methuselahs who declined to block are still declining to block. The new controller, if he is eligible and has not declined to block yet, can block with the stolen minion even if the previous controller has declined to block. [PIB 20150501]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/70780-change-of-control-during-the-action?start=6#70800
If one is ousted while having temporary control of a minion, the minion is removed from the game. [LSJ 20081105]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/CYjOJtTBMGU/m/H8kQXN1w2ycJ
The blood comes from the blood bank. [ANK 20190511]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77483-wording-inconsistency-with-tend-the-flock?start=6#94022
[OBT] A minion previously attempting to block can resign his attempt and pay no blood. [LSJ 20031121-2]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/1khXmKPU0ws/Je_X4gvv72kJ

[OBT] An ally has life, not blood, he cannot pay. [LSJ 20050216] [ANK 20190701]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/5_rUFgufFc4/7OVVD0KpnS4Jhttp://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77763-multiple-questions#95690
Pool is not paid when an imbued is incapacitated. [LSJ 20060409-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/lWdr_Ym-UIg/m/t_xVzJIXW18J
Cards are not replaced during the "as played" window. [LSJ 20061013]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/6w8K3yDtBH0/m/M_SZH9Id8n8J

If the canceled card had a "Do Not Replace Until" clause on it, that clause is canceled as well and the card is replaced normally. [LSJ 20011023]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/2GOLIrXAF8M/P4T3Dj6UNL0J
[ANI] It affects card costs, cost reductions from other effects do apply. [LSJ 20070829-1]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/sVXZw1J43ik/OByFPgQsynwJ

[ANI] Also affects the cost of combat cards played at then of a round or combat (eg. {Disarm}, {Telepathic Tracking}, {Psyche!}, {Taste of Vitae}). [ANK 20191221]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76990-correct-order-impulse-for-combat-cards-after-combat#90516
The provided action is an "equip action" [TOM 19960130]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/wF82VdVPlm0/MmFo2E7lrY8J
If your prey cannot afford to contest, she pays what she has, she is ousted, and you still yield. [RTR 20010710]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/GsI1UyH54jU/x9LfDZX1vR4J
Can target a minion with less blood or life than the amount stolen. [RTR 20010711]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/GsI1UyH54jU/x9LfDZX1vR4J

If both opponents play Theft of Vitae, they resolve simultaneously: blood amounts are adjusted by the total of gain and loss and no blood wear off. The vampire coming out of uncontrolled keeps the cards and blood he has, if any. [LSJ 20100206-2]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/reXyybyIYX8/m/jeCyjdiZ5T4J

A vampire with no circle designation is in his own unique circle. Vampires with the same name (eg. {The Embrace}, non-unique vampires) do not share a circle by default, each has his own circle of one by default. [LSJ 20020609]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/Q_Lk0DPHqC8/nAfGfCvsISgJ

When computing the cost of a card, multiplications and divisions are applied first, followed by additions and subtractions. Is not a vampire in the ash heap (eg. {Possession} cannot be played on it). [LSJ 20020115]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/wG_tDLgfZso/6mKkp7Rw3OcJ

If moved to the uncontrolled region (eg. by {Banishment}), it continues to be a vampire and can be influenced. [RTR 19990712]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/x5k5Vw_hkI0/lCqkvlUz5yIJ

Is not a vampire in the ash heap (eg. {Possession} cannot be played on it). [LSJ 20020115]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/wG_tDLgfZso/6mKkp7Rw3OcJ

If moved to the uncontrolled region (eg. by {Banishment}), it continues to be a vampire and can be influenced. [RTR 19990712]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/x5k5Vw_hkI0/lCqkvlUz5yIJ

If the action continues "as if unblocked", all action modifiers and reaction cards are still in effect, even those pertaining to a successful block. If the action continues "as if unblocked", Methuselah that had declined to block before do not get another opportunity to block. [ANK 20190116]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77302-strike-combat-ends-continue-with-the-action#92916

Can be used when the vampire is in torpor. [PIB 20150522]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/71291-blood-doll-and-the-rack-clarity#71293

[AUS][SER] Replace the action card (if any) before playing it. [ANK 20181208]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/77210-touch-of-clarity-and-fast-reaction-is-posible-to-play-with-locked-minion?start=6#92308

If the damage is reduced (eg. {Nephandus}) or not inflicted (eg. {Blood Fury}), the corresponding token is not burned (contrary to prevented damage). [LSJ 20100519]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/criytfhw97o/sj9_vGAi-xQJ
Full damage is applied if there are any counter left, even just 1. [ANK 20201229-2]https://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/78958-weighted-walking-stick-with-1-counter-remaining#101326

Once in play, can be equipped from the minion it's on (rulebook action) by another minion that does not meet the requirements. [ANK 20180719-3]http://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/76834-moving-equipment-with-requirements#89044
[POT] The press can only be used during the current round. [TOM 19960521]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/poYD3n0TKGo/xvU5HW7lBxMJ

Cannot be used to prevent aggravated damage, even if the minion treats them as normal damage (eg. {Skin of Night}). [LSJ 20040812-2] [PIB 20130327]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/E7D1cVmAdqQ/m/MvPApbrT14gJhttps://www.vekn.net/forum/rules-questions/46279-soak-vs-treat-agg-damage-as-normal-damage#46285
Additional damage inherits all of the properties of the base damage. [TOM 19960225]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/0LLTOfvyVbM/ih72_C-LriwJ
The card to retrieve must be announced when declaring the action. [LSJ 20010627]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/NhNCVCCDyU0/I5Yph3-UUPsJ

Damage done to the bearer is environmental. [LSJ 19970801]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/7ZnLKTdPEn4/6L-nVarAJwMJ

Does not burn if combat ends before it resolves (eg. if the opponent uses a "strike: combat ends"). The damage is environmental, the retainer is the damage source. Immunity to retainer or retainer type works against it. Ceils the vampire's capacity, including effects that have changed it, to X. {Orun} adds to that X, or the vampire's capacity if it is lower, for cards played by other players. [LSJ 20051205]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/K-RE-nTJ_Cg/Ao3LhiAPXk4J

When a vampire is influenced, the excess blood drains off before entering contest (if any) and before playing "as played/as he enters play" effects. [LSJ 20100902]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/SM2_578Th0U/-GX0pSP_rCcJ

The effect is not optional. [RTR 19980707]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/t3BWHkOrdyE/1jH5udLMdiYJ

Is a temporary effect that overrides the underlying sect. The most recent override takes precedence. It stays active if another effect changes the underlying sect, like using the default action to become Anarch. If the target changes sect to a sect inappropriate for his title, he loses its benefit until his sect is appropriate. He immediately yields the title if it is contested or he receives a new one. [LSJ 20060904]https://groups.google.com/d/msg/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/L9D4GK0yNv8/H9vnUciv2psJ

If {Rötschreck} is played against the acting vampire, the Sabbat vampire takes 2 damage (combat ends before torpor), the acting vampire goes to torpor and no referendum is conducted. [LSJ 20080821]https://groups.google.com/g/rec.games.trading-cards.jyhad/c/hZF1Joxwc2s/m/o1FSURsGv0wJ

The effect is applied after cards that are played "at the end of the round (eg. {Disarm}) or "when combat would end".
